attributes.name: Kevine Tchoukedjoup
attributes.cv_link: Iâ€™m a bilingual translator with over 3 years of experience translating between English and French. I specialize in medical, crypto, and game-related content, offering both human translation and post-editing of machine-translated (MTPE) texts.  My background includes work in clinical documentation, crypto whitepapers, smart contracts, and mobile game UI/dialogue. I strive for clarity, cultural relevance, and precise terminology.
